option.name: VM_PARAMETERS

task.summary: Modified and improved a lot of little but no significant things
Changed closing the connection from stream.write(" exit" + '\n') to the simpler stream.close() Removed responses after exit Added a way to see if the adb connection couldn't close

MESSAGE.value: Modified and improved a lot of little but no significant things
Changed closing the connection from stream.write(" exit" + '\n') to the simpler stream.close() Removed responses after exit Added a way to see if the adb connection couldn't close

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Changed closing the connection from stream.write(" exit" + '\n') to the simpler stream.close() Removed responses after exit Added a way to see if the adb connection couldn't close
